CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Community Analytics
CurrentVersion.description: Updates to community analytics will allow community admins to better understand engagement trends, reach and the top conversations that occur within their communities.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Community Analytics
OldVersion.description: Updates to community analytics will allow community admins to better understand engagement trends, reach and the top conversations that occur within their communities. This item is no longer accurate and is being removed from the roadmap.  We apologize for any inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Integration into Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Initiate a Copilot impact survey that helps leaders and IT admins understand the return on investment of rolling out Copilot and AI tools across their organizations. Viva Pulse provides a way for organizations to capture sentiment data that maps to work patterns data from Viva Insights to measure AI adoption.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Integration into Microsoft Copilot Dashboard from Viva Insights
OldVersion.description: Initiate a Copilot impact survey that helps leaders and IT admins understand the return on investment of rolling out Copilot and AI tools across their organizations. Viva Pulse provides a way for organizations to capture sentiment data that maps to work patterns data from Viva Insights to measure AI adoption.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create with Copilot in Excel generates templates and tables
CurrentVersion.description: Create with Copilot in Excel helps customers write prompts to generate tailored templates and tables, using multi-turn conversion to refine the table schema, formulas, and visuals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Create with Copilot in Excel generates templates and tables
OldVersion.description: Create with Copilot in Excel helps customers write prompts to generate tailored templates and tables, using multi-turn conversion to refine the table schema, formulas, and visuals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Power Apps card for Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: This card allows you to bring your Power Apps and Cards on the dashboard for quick access.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Power Apps card for Viva Connections
OldVersion.description: This card allows you to bring your Power Apps and Cards on the dashboard for quick access.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Forms data sync support in Excel desktop
CurrentVersion.description: Users can get up-to-date form responses data in Excel desktop. Users can also create a new form from Excel desktop with a data sync connection to the Excel workbook.

OldVersion.title: Excel: Forms data sync support in Excel desktop
OldVersion.description: Users can get up-to-date form responses data in Excel desktop. Users can also create a new form from Excel desktop with a data sync connection to the Excel workbook.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Separate policies to control transcription for Town halls and Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Town halls and webinars will now have separate policies to allow or disable transcription in instances. Previously, the transcription policies for town halls and webinars automatically inherited the transcription policy set for meetings. This option to implement different policies for town hall and webinars is available for users on all licenses.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Separate recording policies for Town halls and Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: Town halls and webinars will now have separate policies to allow or disable recordings. Previously, the recording policies for town halls and webinars automatically inherited the recording policy set for meetings. This option to implement different policies for town hall and webinars is available for users on all licenses.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Move email between mailbox and PST file in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook data files) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able move (drag and drop) emails from a .pst file to a mailbox and vice versa. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Move email between mailbox and PST file in new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook data files) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able move (drag and drop) emails from a .pst file to a mailbox and vice versa. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Manage email in PST files in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook data files) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to move, copy, delete, flag/unflag, mark as read/unread, and set categories for email within .pst files. Additionally, users will be able to create, delete, move, and rename folders within .pst files. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Manage email in PST files in new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook data files) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to move, copy, delete, flag/unflag, mark as read/unread, and set categories for email within .pst files. Additionally, users will be able to create, delete, move, and rename folders within .pst files. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows
